bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. Pathological Mechanism of heavy and turbid evil accumulating in the body, such as phlegm turbidity and abiding food which in turn may bring forth further disease. JFFH : 砒丹巴硇，毒熱類聚，劑成丸藥，其氣凶暴，其體重滯，積垢雖行，毒 氣未過 , “If substances like pi [ shuang ], dan , ba [ dou ], and nao [ sha ] – [i.e. substances representing] one-sided collections of poison heat - are used to prepare pills for medication, their qi is extremely violent, and their material consistency is heavy and sluggish. Even though one may be able to move the accumulated filth , its poison qi cannot be overcome”.
